items.sentence: You\'re the only person I know here in Australia.
Tom didn\'t eat the sandwich that I made for him.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had a house on Park Street.
I don\'t understand how you were able to do that.
Tom was the one who gave me Mary\'s phone number.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea why his wife left him.
That\'s the most beautiful woman I\'ve ever seen.
You don\'t have to do that if you don\'t want to.
Tom was deeply affected by the death of his wife.
Tom was executed on October 20th three years ago.
Tom told me not to tell Mary about what happened.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was planning to leave.
Tom doesn\'t know anybody who is able to do that.
Tom will be behind bars for the rest of his life.
I suspect Tom and Mary do that from time to time.
We didn\'t have a computer when I was growing up.
Tom washed his hands, but Mary didn\'t wash hers.
Tom wasn\'t able to find what he was looking for.
I have a lot of work that still needs to be done.
Tom needs to be told he doesn\'t need to do that.
I\'d like to get part-time work in the cafeteria.
Tom says he wasn\'t the one who broke the window.
Tom lived in one of Boston\'s best neighborhoods.
Tom lives in one of Boston\'s best neighborhoods.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve gone swimming.
It would be better for you to stay away from Tom.
I didn\'t show Tom the pictures he wanted to see.
I didn\'t start to go bald until I turned thirty.
I didn\'t think Tom could speak French that well.
The bomb is quite likely somewhere on this floor.
I couldn\'t help but notice that you\'re in pain.
Tom said we could ask him any questions we liked.
I wish my grandfather had been alive to see that.
I wish that I could give you everything you want.
I wish to sit here with you for a while and talk.
It looks like Tom needs to study a little harder.
It looks like Tom will be coming here next month.
It took us three days to walk through the forest.
Tom took his helmet off and put it on the ground.
I don\'t think Tom understood what was happening.
Tom lives in the same apartment building as Mary.
Tom locked the drawer and put the key his pocket.
I think it\'s impossible for us to do that today.
I\'d rather stay home than go on the school trip.
When was the last time you received a compliment?
When was the last time you were really surprised?
When you go to Boston, where do you plan to stay?
Tom and I eat lunch together every day at school.
Tom studies French at least thirty minutes a day.
How many liters do you think this tank will hold?
